thread.title: Obama Recovers From Gaffe By Singing 'Movin' On Up'
thread.title_full: Obama Recovers From Gaffe By Singing 'Movin' On Up'

title: Obama Recovers From Gaffe By Singing 'Movin' On Up'
text:
Obama Recovers From Gaffe By Singing 'Movin' On Up' He finally got a piece of the pie. Paige Lavender Senior Politics Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/28/2015 09:19 AM EDT | Edited: 51 minutes ago 
President Barack Obama committed a pretty big gaffe while walking around New Orleans on Thursday. 
Obama, who was in town to commemorate the 10th anniversary of Hurricane Katrina, met a woman named Weezy while walking around New Orleans. 
"Weezy? Really? Like, Weezy? Like in 'Sanford & Son?'" Obama said. 
Weezy quickly called the president out on his gaffe, noting that Weezy was actually the name of a character on "The Jeffersons." The two then broke out into the show's famous theme song, "Movin' On Up." 
Watch a clip of the moment above. 
Also on HuffPost: Sasha, Malia, Michelle & Barack Obama of
